soundscapecode.periodicity

soundscapecode.periodicity(data: ndarray, fs) → int

Calculates the periodicity for sound data.

Parameters

data: np.ndarray

an array-like with shape (n, 1)

Returns

int

The periodicity

Raises

AttributeError

if either data input is not a vector

Examples

>>>import numpy as np >>>fs = 48000 >>>sound = np.random.rand(fs*60,1) >>>ssc.periodicity(sound, fs): 1
